participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, always eager to explore new ideas and capture moments through photography.
participant_1.background: I am fluent in English, Spanish, and French. My boyfriend and I are moving into an apartment together next week. My favorite colors are red and silver. I am interested in photography and like taking pictures. I am an elementary school teacher.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Playful and energetic, with a penchant for creating fun and engaging games.
participant_2.background: I hate school. I have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. I am a 12 year old girl. I love to play pobox.
